title: CY60117: Reagents In Organic Synthesis - Quick Facts
text:
CY60117
Course name | Reagents In Organic Synthesis
Offered by | Chemistry
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite : NilOrganosilicon, organotin, organoborane reagents; organocopper, organopalladium and functionalized Grignard reagents; oragnocatalysts; metal carbonyl reagents; Lewis Acids in organic synthesis. Books: Some Modern methods of Organic Synthesis by W. Carruthers, 2004; Advanced Organic Chemistry Pt B: Reaction and Synthesis by F. A. Carey and R. J. Sundberg, 2001.
